nodes.text: Not even did the blessed Biblical prophets nor Jesus himself change the behavior of a people so steeped in immorality and idolatry.
Mohammed's exceptional personality derived from a Revelation from God
They as well believed with all their hearts that this man whom they slept with whom they ate with and whom they fought with was in fact recieving Revelation from GOD.
They knew because of his outstanding moral character and from his trustworthy personality
If we were to take a look at Arabia before and after the coming of Muhammad we would see two completely different societies.
The best explanation for Mohammed's exceptional moral characteristics is that he has received the Revelation from God
Mohammed`s exceptional characteristics changed the society
The changes that happened under Mohammed were incredible
Now something has to accomodate for this

if Muhammad exhibited such outstanding moral characteristics that those who were not close to him would come to believe that he was always a trustworthy and honourable person and that they would have no reason to disbelieve in his claim of Divine Revelation.
